column4: can someone tell me if the month names in command "last" are translated in non-english ubuntu?
If you have another language installed, you can check yourself, something like this: LANG=ru_RU.UTF8 last
must say i didn't know this, but unfortunately i don't have any other language installed other than english
Please note that for root you may not use "sudo crontab -e" or anything. You have to edit /etc/crontab, it should not need any password set or anything
